bench-press.name: Bench Press
bench-press.description: The bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

push-up.name: Push Ups
push-up.description: Push-ups are a bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and core.

dumbbell-bench-press.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
dumbbell-bench-press.description: The dumbbell bench press is a compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps using dumbbells.

dumbbell-fly.name: Dumbbell Fly
dumbbell-fly.description: The dumbbell fly is an isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles using dumbbells.

dumbbell-incline-press.name: Dumbbell Incline Press
dumbbell-incline-press.description: The dumbbell incline press is a compound exercise that targets the upper chest, shoulders, and triceps using dumbbells.

high-cable-crossover.name: High Cable Crossover
high-cable-crossover.description: The high cable crossover is an isolation exercise that targets the upper chest muscles using a cable machine.

low-cable-crossover.name: Low Cable Crossover
low-cable-crossover.description: The low cable crossover is an isolation exercise that targets the lower chest muscles using a cable machine.

pec-deck-fly.name: Pec Deck Fly
pec-deck-fly.description: The pec deck fly is an isolation exercise that targets the chest muscles using a pec deck machine.

chest-dips.name: Chest Dips
chest-dips.description: Chest dips are a bodyweight exercise that targets the lower chest, triceps, and shoulders.

squat.name: Squats
squat.description: The squat is a fundamental lower body exercise targeting the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

deadlift.name: Deadlift
deadlift.description: The deadlift is a compound exercise that targets the entire posterior chain, including the back, glutes, and hamstrings.

lat-pulldown.name: Lat Pulldown
lat-pulldown.description: The lat pulldown is an exercise that targets the latissimus dorsi muscles in the back.

seated-cable-row.name: Seated Cable Row
seated-cable-row.description: The seated cable row is an exercise that targets the muscles of the upper back and biceps.

closegrip-cable-row.name: Close-Grip Cable Row
closegrip-cable-row.description: The close-grip cable row is an exercise that targets the middle back and biceps using a close grip.

pushdown.name: Tricep Pushdown
pushdown.description: The tricep pushdown is an isolation exercise that targets the triceps muscles using a cable machine.

dumbbell-curl.name: Dumbbell Curl
dumbbell-curl.description: The dumbbell curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscles using dumbbells.

barbell-curl.name: Barbell Curl
barbell-curl.description: The barbell curl is an isolation exercise that targets the biceps muscles using a barbell.

dumbbell-lateral-raise.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
dumbbell-lateral-raise.description: The dumbbell lateral raise is an isolation exercise that targets the shoulder muscles, specifically the lateral deltoids.
